title: Trade unionists' hearts with victims of Ankara blast (ETUC - European Trade Union Confederation)
text: ( Source : ETUC - European Trade Union Confederation ) Luca Visentini, General Secretary of the European Trade Union Confederation, this afternoon said 'The hearts and thoughts of all trade unionists are with the dead and the injured of this
